resources.string: Choose what size grid you\'d like to play:

It's you against a grid of squares.

Some squares have a mine hidden under them; clicking on one loses the game. Other squares are safe; clicking on one clears the square, revealing a clue: a number indicating how many of its neighbors are mined.

Your job is to clear all the safe squares, and plant a warning flag on all the mined squares.

To flag a square, click on the flag icon on the right side of the touchscreen and then click on the square. (Or, if you feel brave, you can just long-click on the square.)

To start a new game, click on the robot icon.

Good luck!
